achievements.title: NASA Space Settlement Contest
achievements.bodyText:
-  **Secured 3rd rank** in the **NASA Space Settlement Contest** and was invited for the **33rd International Space Development Conference (ISDC)** in **Los Angeles, California.** 
- Designed an innovative space habitat concept focusing on sustainability, artificial gravity, and long-term human habitation, evaluated by NASA experts and space industry professionals.

achievements.title: Dronix - Wings'20
achievements.bodyText:
- **1st Place Winner** in a **technical drone challenge** called Dronix, held at Government College of Engineering Aurangabad, India.
 - Received **INR 30k cash prize** for **outstanding drone performance** in the competition.

achievements.title: FAA 107 sUAS Pilot License
achievements.bodyText:
- Certified as a **FAA Part 107 Remote Pilot** for small Unmanned Aircraft Systems (sUAS), authorized to operate drones in United States.
 - **Valid Until June 2027.**

achievements.title: Research Paper Publication
achievements.bodyText:
- Published research on **EEG-based person identification** using **deep learning**, achieving **99.97% accuracy** with **stacked LSTM** on the DEAP dataset.
-  J. . Rathi, H. . Lakhwani, S. . Ramani, V. . Rathod, and N. . Kulkarni, **Employing Biomedical Signals as a Means of Biometric IdentiÔ¨Åcation**, ijngc, vol. 13, no. 5, Nov. 2022.

achievements.title: Indian Railways Drone Project
achievements.bodyText:
- Assisted **Indian Railways** in **drone piloting** & **aerial cinematography** for a redevelopment project using the **DJI Phantom 4** Drone.
-  Contributed to aerial site mapping, structural analysis, and progress monitoring through drone footage.

achievements.title: Drone Racing - Pragyaa'20
achievements.bodyText:
- **2nd Place Winner** in a technical drone challenge called Drone Racing, held at Shri Guru Gobind Singhji Institute of Engineering & Technology, Nanded, India.
 - **Awarded INR 10k cash prize** for great manuvering and piloting skills!

achievements.title: Amazon ML Summer School
achievements.bodyText:
- **Selected for the highly competitive Amazon ML Summer School, **among top candidates from over 20,000 applicants** across India.
 - Gained hands-on experience in machine learning through expert-led sessions and projects by Amazon scientists, with focus on real-world applications.
